description:
It`s almost time for the next Sehagaga Academy culture fair.  Everyone is told to participate in an event, and everybody has their own idea of what to do.  Part of the fair is a beauty contest, and so they start looking at their rivals.  The three of them look at the profiles, and they`re all very strange people...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kagayake! Dai 54 Kai! Nouten Chokugeki! Porori wa Nai Kedo Porori Seishun Genkai no Barrier o Uchiyabure! Sehagaga Gakuen Bunkasai!
Shine! Episode 54! Shock to the Brain! No Boobs, but We`ll Destroy the Barriers of Boob-obsessed Youth! Sehagaga Academy Fair!
輝け!第54回!脳天直撃!ポロリはないけどポロリ青春 限界のバリアを打ち破れ!セハガガ学園文化祭!
